value.title: How to show 5 minute intervals in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Another question from the comments...  MrTavelBlog wanted to know how to show 5 minute intervals in Power BI. Patrick accepts the challenge and shows you how!  Power BI date table: create using DAX https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gyvhM5eiT0U  Working with time in Power BI Desktop https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8DFih8ccMV0

value.title: Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium
value.excerpt: In this video, Christian Wade joined Adam Saxton to discuss Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium. You can use Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium to take your dataset beyond 1GB and avoid failures such as timeouts.  Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium documentation - https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-premium-incremental-refresh

value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach. Data Protection documentation overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-security-data-protection-overview
